title: Not Your Mother's Plump for Joy Body Building Dry Shampoo, 7 Ounce, 2 count, for thin or lifeless hair
description: Not Your Mother's Plump For Joy Body Building Dry Shampoo in 7oz is a gym-bag necessity that builds more body than a day at the gym. Not Your Mother's Plump For Joy Body Building Dry Shampoo spray absorbs excess oils, produces fresh volume, and leaves no residue. You washed and dried yesterday. (Nothin' beats that fresh blowout look.) But it's day two and the elements have been less than kind. Keep your big, beautiful style with Plump For Joy! This salon formula dry shampoo will absorb dirt and oils and lift lifeless hair so you can extend those voluminous visions without the hair dryer hassle.
